name: salesOrderRepositoryV1SavePut
description: Performs persist operations for a specified order.

sales-data-order-interface.description: Order interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

base_shipping_discount_tax_compensation_.description: Base shipping discount tax compensation amount.

sales-data-order-address-interface.description: Order address interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

street.description: Array of any street values. Otherwise, null.

company-data-company-order-interface.description: Order company extension attributes interface. Adds new company attributes to orders.

associated_item_id.description: Associated item id if this item is associated with another item, null otherwise

item_id.description: Item id if this item is a product

type.description: Type (shipping, product, weee, gift wrapping, etc)

sales-data-order-item-interface.description: Order item interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

base_weee_tax_applied_row_amnt.description: Base WEEE tax applied row amount.

temando-shipping-data-collection-point-o.description: Temando Order Collection Point Interface  Order Details/Fulfillment

temando-shipping-data-order-shipping-exp.description: Temando Shipping Experience Interface Local representation of a shipping rate in checkout. A set of shipping experiences is the result of creating an order at the Temando platform. (!) Needs to reside in Api namespace because selected shipping experience is exposed to public as a ShippingInterface extension attribute.

base_shipping_discount_tax_compensation_.description: Base shipping discount tax compensation amount.

sales-data-order-payment-interface.description: Order payment interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

cc_last4.description: Last four digits of the credit card.

sales-data-order-status-history-interfac.description: Order status history interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.
